ast.name: TV show tracker
ast.comment:
The basic function of this app is to track your favourite tv shows and make sure to keep yourself up to date and never miss an episode again.

An example of the look I'm going for can be seen in the art section. I uploaded a screenshot of the interface.

Every content within this application (shows, episodes, airtimes, pictures, etc.) is provided by the XML API.

I structured my actions the following:
all "dspXxx" actions are my pages to display
all "setXxx" actions have access to the XML API and receive data from there
all "getXxx" actions interact within the app and get data from the records or data

For navigation through the single pages I use the following:
tap wall Page Button
tap wall Picture
flip wall (<- I haven't found out yet how to do that, but I definitely want to use that event as described in the "dspXxx" actions

All information, once its downloaded via the API, is either stored in data or records.
Episodes and series information are stored each in index records

Additional features I'd like to add but I'm sure I don't have enough time for:
- Settings (set up Homescreen (Favourites, Schedule or Watchlist))
- Statistics (How many series added, how many episodes, percentage of seen episodes, summarised hours of episodes watched)
- Rate shows/episodes
- Top10 shows/episodes
- Add episodes to calendar
- Suggest shows/episodes to friends via message/e-mail
- Shake to search randomly for a show or alternatively get random episode of favourites
- Video preview of single episodes

body.text: If the user starts the app for the very first time and the global variable favouriteShows is invalid, the user will be forwarded to the search page. otherwise the favourites will be displayed
Set a mirror to access the API

body.text: Needed to navigate from favourites to series page

Right now I haven't found a way to save several infos in a picture (meta data like name, id, etc.). To find out, which show was tapped, I save some pixel information of the tapped picture and compare it to the same pixel data in every picture from the saved favourites.

If all information the same -> open the series details wall

body.text: Show Basic information about a single episode of a show. Navigate to upcoming/previous episode by flipping the screen
I'm not sure if i will use this Site but if, there will be some general information about the app and the API it uses
All episodes which haven't been marked as watched are listed here ordered by show, season and episode
Every very next episode of each favourited series will be listed here with its date to air.
Input field to search for tv shows. all results will be listed below and can be added to favourites by tapping on them

app.comment:
The basic function of this app is to track your favourite tv shows and make sure to keep yourself up to date and never miss an episode again.
Every content within this application (shows, episodes, airtimes, pictures, etc.) is provided by a XML API (http://thetvdb.com).
-----------------------------------
Instruction manual how to interact within the app:
You will automatically be forwarded to the search after the initial launch. Tap on a result to add a show to the favourites. It will take a while because pictures of each episode of the show will be downloaded (I will change this in future versions).
Favourites: Tap on the banner to go to the show details. Details as well as the previous two aired episodes respectively the previous aired and the next announced episode (if exists) are provided. Page Buttons: all episodes of the show, delete from favourites, or mark all aired episodes as seen.
Episodes are categorised within seasons.Use the page buttons to navigate. To get back, use the phones back button.
To leave the series details, use the phones back button as well.
Schedule: Here you can find only the very next episode of each episode (if already announced) sorted by date and show.
Watchlist: Tap on the episode you want to mark as seen. Only episodes which already have been aired will appear in this list.
-------------------------------------
Additional features I'd like to add in the future:
- Settings, Statistics, Ratings
- Add episodes to calendar
- Suggest shows/episodes to friends via message/e-mail
- Video preview of single episodes
- single episode view
- social interaction with friends within the app
- build a proper interface which is more comfortable
- change process of downloading episode images
